name: Whitby Village
description:
Whitby is a quaint small village near a dense forest. 
A few homes line the outskirts of town with the village tavern in the middle. 
To the north of the village there is a forest and to the south there is a Mountain Pass.

name: Forest
description:
It is a densely wooded forest, with light streaming from the sky above. 
The forest has a flat path and will be an easier journey to find the potion. 
As you enter the forest you see dense tall pine trees and find a flat, narrow path.

name: Mountain Pass
description:
Before you lies the great mountain pass, here you recall tales of an old hermit guarding these trails. 
Here you find a steep rocky slope that rises at a sharp angle 
and will be difficult to climb. Watch your step.

name: River North
description:
You have traveled to a roaring river with a strong current and a rocky bed. 
Prone to flooding and a great ambush site for enemies. 
To the east you see Langtoft Village and to travel back to the Forest you must travel West.

name: River South
description:
You have traveled to a roaring river with a strong current and a rocky bed. 
Prone to flooding and a great ambush site for enemies. 
To the east you see Langtoft Village and to travel back to the Mountains you must travel West.

name: Langtoft Village
description:
Langtoft is a bustling town that sits next to the large river, 
this is a bustling town where merchants and traders from across the country come to trade. 
This is where the doctor said you would find potion to cure your sister.
